name: Sweetwhey Snooping and Tailing Co.
description:
Thanks for checking out my entry for Metroidvania Month! Please hang in there for it to load, it's pretty big for a browser game!

== CONTROLS ==

  • World:
    • A/D - Left/Right
    • SPACE - Jump 
    • S - Scurry
    • J - Interact 
    • K - Inspect
    • I - Open/Close Inventory
    • R - Reset Player Position to Start
  • Inventory:
    • W/A/S/D: Move Cursor
    • J: Select / Deselect Item
    • Spacebar: Rotate Selected Item
  • Dialogue:
    • W/S - Select Option
    • J - Confirm Option
